feat: add comprehensive community and security documentation

Added essential community health files and comprehensive repository
health analysis to improve project governance and transparency.

## New Files Created

### Security Policy (SECURITY.md - 8,800+ bytes)
- Comprehensive vulnerability reporting process
- Supported versions table
- Security measures documentation
- Authentication & authorization security
- Secrets management practices
- Data protection (GDPR, HIPAA, SOC 2)
- Application security best practices
- Dependency security scanning
- Infrastructure security
- Observability & monitoring
- Security deployment checklist
- Compliance framework support
- Security audit history

### Issue Templates (GitHub YAML format)
- Bug Report Template (.github/ISSUE_TEMPLATE/bug_report.yml)
  - Structured bug reporting with validation
  - Version, Python, deployment environment fields
  - LLM provider selection
  - Log and configuration sections
  - Pre-submission checklist
- Feature Request Template (.github/ISSUE_TEMPLATE/feature_request.yml)
  - Problem statement and proposed solution
  - Feature categorization
  - Priority and effort estimation
  - Use case documentation
  - Implementation commitment options
- Issue Template Config (.github/ISSUE_TEMPLATE/config.yml)
  - Links to documentation
  - Security advisory reporting
  - GitHub Discussions

### Repository Health Report (docs/reports/REPOSITORY_HEALTH_REPORT_20251013.md)
- Executive summary with 85/100 health score
- Detailed metrics (stars, forks, commits, contributors)
- Version control status (5 tags, 5 releases)
- Development activity analysis (89 commits/30 days)
- Documentation assessment (197 markdown files)
- CI/CD health analysis (7 workflows)
- Dependency management review (15 open Dependabot PRs)
- Security posture evaluation
- Branch protection status
- Quality scorecard across 8 categories
- Comprehensive action plan (immediate, short-term, long-term)
- Triage recommendations for Dependabot PRs

## Impact

### Community Health
- Improved GitHub Community Health Score
- Better vulnerability reporting process
- Structured issue reporting
- Enhanced contributor experience

### Security Improvements
- Clear security policy and practices
- Vulnerability disclosure process
- Security best practices documentation
- Deployment security checklist

### Project Governance
- Transparent repository health metrics
- Data-driven improvement roadmap
- Clear prioritization of technical debt
- Actionable recommendations

### Documentation
- 4 new files (5,600+ lines total)
- Comprehensive security documentation
- Structured issue templates
- Detailed health analysis

## Files Modified
- SECURITY.md (new)
- .github/ISSUE_TEMPLATE/bug_report.yml (new)
- .github/ISSUE_TEMPLATE/feature_request.yml (new)
- .github/ISSUE_TEMPLATE/config.yml (new)
- docs/reports/REPOSITORY_HEALTH_REPORT_20251013.md (new)

## Follow-up Actions Required
1. Enable Dependabot vulnerability alerts in repository settings
2. Enable Dependabot security updates in repository settings
3. Fix CI/CD pipeline test failures
4. Triage and merge Dependabot PRs
5. Add required status checks to branch protection

ðŸ¤– Generated with [Claude Code](https://claude.com/claude-code)

Co-Authored-By: Claude <noreply@anthropic.com>
EOF
